message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe you'll find immense value in it. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive access you're getting to this high-quality item. I look forward to hearing your response.
